Title: The Hunting of the President
Writer: Joe Conason (book), Gene Lyons (book), Nickolas Perry (screenplay), Harry Thomason (screenplay)
Actors: Morgan Freeman, Jonathan Alter, Steve Barnes, Paul Begala
Plot: Harry Thomason and Nickolas Perry's incendiary documentary, based on the best-selling book by Gene Lyons and Joe Conason, offers a glimpse at the genesis of these partisan vendettas and explores the myths and truths behind the nearly ten year campaign to systematically destroy the political legacy of the Clintons.
